m_szDocTitle: LG surges 14% on deal with GM to make parts for Chevy Bolt EV
m_szDocSumamry: Wednesday, 21 Oct 2015 |  5:25  AM ET CNBC.com SHARES  GM and LG join forces to produce electric cars                   LG is teaming up with GM, supplying key parts for the automaker's Chevrolet Bolt electric vehicle.  Shares in LG Electronics surged over 14 percent after the South Korean electronics giant announced that it would be providing key components for General Motors' upcoming electric car.
